author: olegk
msg: MIME4J-197: Added 'lenient' ContentTypeField implementation; added LenientFieldParser as an alternative to DefaultFieldParser

author: stsp
msg: Fix another case of issue #3901, "upgrade doesn't handle depth=exclude",
where the excluded item is within a copied tree. This makes the test
(write_entry): Expand an assertion to accommodate for excluded children
of a copied directory and make sure to pick the right tree (base vs. working)
for such nodes. Don't reset the working node's presence to 'incomplete'
if it's already been set to 'excluded' (same fix as made for base nodes

author: mherndon
msg: LUCENENET-400 adding the code that excutes xbuild for mono using a shell script.  tweaking the build.xml to work for both msbuild & xbuild. expliciting naming the target 'lucene' for the lucene only build, instead being too generic and calling it 'build'

author: scottbw
msg: Separated out JCR persistence implementation from the core server into a separate module and added a decoupled loader mechanism.
